title: Electoral Process (Local Government By-Elections) (Election Date and Time of Poll) (No. 6) Order, 2019
content:
13thSeptember,2019 StatutoryInstruments 263
GOVERNMENT OF ZAMBIA
STATUTORY INSTRUMENT NO.61 OF2019
The Electoral Process Act, 2016
(ActNo.35of2016)
The Electoral Process (Local Government By-Elections)
(Election Date and Time of Poll)
(No. 6) Order, 2019
INEXERCISEofthepowerscontainedinsection125oftheElectoral
ProcessAct,2016,thefollowingOrderismade:
1. This Order may be cited as the Electoral Process (Local Title
GovernmentBy-Elections)(ElectionDateandTimeofPoll)(No.6)
Order,2019.
2. A candidate for election as a councillor in a district and Dateand
ward set out in the Schedule shall lodge a nomination with the timeof
nomination
ReturningOfficeronTuesday,17thSeptember,2019,between0900 forelections
hoursand1500hours.
3. ThecampaignperiodshallcommenceonTuesday,17thJuly, Campaign
2019, at 1500 hours and close at 1800 hours onWednesday, 9th period
October,2019.
4. (1) Thepollfortheelectionofacouncillorinadistrictand Electiondate
ward set out in the Schedule shall take place on Thursday, 10th andtimesof
poll
October,2019,between0600hoursand1800hours.
(2) Apollshallnotbetakeninawardifonlyonecandidateis
validlynominated.
CopiesofthisStatutoryInstrumentcanbeobtainedfromtheGovernmentPrinter,
P.O.Box30136,10101,Lusaka,PriceK4.00 each
262 Statutory Instruments 7thJune,2019
SCHEDULE
(Paragraphs2and4)
ELECTIONFORCOUNCILCHAIRPERSON
Province District
Western Kaoma
ELECTIONFORCOUNCILLOR
District Constituency Ward No. Name
Kabompo Kabompo 108003003 Chikonkwelo
Mwinilunga Mwinilunga 108007007 Samuteba
Made by the Electoral Commission of Zambia at Lusaka this 9th day of
September,2019.
JUSTICE E.E. CHULU,
